ygData.subject: Re: The old brass problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks muchly for that.  I wasn t sure if the horn worked since there didn t seem to any kind of dance or animation at all with it.  Is that normal?  I did
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks muchly for that. I wasn't sure if the horn worked since there
didn't seem to any kind of dance or animation at all with it. Is that
normal? I did notice a horn mouthpiece in Qeynos when I spent a few
minutes there the other day, is that anything useful? Or have I just
missed something totally obvious on my infrequent travels!

Anyway, I'm out for the day, so I think I'll leave it running at just
the point you suggest!! Thanks again


On Sat, 20 Nov 1999 03:58:39 EST, you wrote:

>From: Valharick@...
>
>You want to use a plain ol' horn. And you will miss MANY notes at first. I
>would suggest going someone far away from people, kicking the song up, and
>let it sit for a couple hours. That will give you a good start into the
>skill. And contrary to what some people say, you do not have to have a target
>for the skill to rise.
>The place I chose for my AFK practice was in Qeynos Hills all the way across
>the zone from the entrance to the karana's, up on the hill. I didn't see one
>living thing and even after letting it sit all night I was still alive :)
>Anyways, good luck to ya.
>
>Renaldo Rallentando of the 34th String
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.

--
Saldara, High Elf Wizard (29 ... again)
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (18)
Brindarya, Dark Elf Warrior (5)
